name: Methodology Testing
description: Execute test scenarios against a methodology to verify it handles happy paths, error paths, edge cases, and state transitions correctly. Goes beyond static validation to runtime testing.

phases.description: Select methodology and prepare test environment
Design test cases: happy path, error path, edge cases, state transitions
Run happy path scenario from Initial to Terminal state
Run error scenarios to verify error handling and recovery paths
Test timeouts, retries, compensation, guards, complex Rules
Generate test report with pass/fail results and coverage metrics
Testing failed - bugs found in methodology

happy_path.description: Complete flow from Initial to Terminal state with no errors

error_path.description: Scenarios triggering error states and recovery paths

edge_cases.description: Timeouts, retries, guards, compensation, boundary conditions

scheduling.trigger: before methodology release OR after significant changes
